title: Unreal Tournament 2004
content:
how many of u played UT 2004? The game is extremely intense. I've only unlocked Xan after my first victory of the whole game. It was tough. AI can also dodge any attacks you make (if u set the difficuty to the hardest, like Godlike). It is [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-bloody.gif[/img] , unless you set the gore level to "no gore." is the game good?

My questions to y'all:

How many of u are using High Speed internet?
How come my game crashes when I try to start a Dedicated Server? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] -----------------------------

Why have you forsaken me, in your eyes forsaken me, in your thoughts forsaken me, in your heart FORSAKENN, me oh...
